name: Catch A Candy
description:
Catch A Candy is a small, free spinoff  of     Catch A Fish, which is currently in development.

  1. collect candy mushrooms for points
  2. collect red mushrooms for extra time
  3. find the magic onion for doublejump
  4. explore the map and   collect  items/start events for additional points
  5. avoid pumpkin jack , he steals your candy

Enjoy Spooktober and have a happy  Halloween !
